Uses of Class
designformats.specctra.CoordinateTransform

  • Packages that use CoordinateTransform 
    Package Description
    board
    Contains classes describing items on a printed circuit board and the board itself.
    designformats.specctra
    Contains classes for reading and writing board designs in the Specctra dsn text format.

    • Uses of CoordinateTransform in board

      CoordinateTransform Communication.coordinate_transform
      For coordinate tramsforms to a Specctra dsn file for example.
